lenders.name: Sonya
lenders.loan_because:
I  am trying to ask for help because of my unfortunate situation. I just dropped 3 classes from college and am only taking one class so I am able to work. I have 1 child and 1 dog who live with me in my grandmothers house. I babysit and make very little money. And i mean very very little. My dog is sick and I am afraid to bring it to the vet because they will take him away. Our dog Is the only thing my 5 year old son has in life. I am trying to loan $1000 dollars so that I can get through for the next 2 months. That is it. I need to feed my baby and hopefully when I find a better job, get back into school. If you can help than it is greatly appreciated!
My personal blog will be up soon so you can get to know a little more about me. Thank you all so much for helping in these tough times.
lenders.occupational_info: I babysit and watch children at my home.

lenders.name: property boom
lenders.loan_because: My name is muhammad nadeem ahmed.I have completed MBA/ MA and running my own newspaper on real estate sector from the last two years named "Monthly Property Boom".In Pakistan thousands of people are engaged in property business.Unfortunately most of them  are uneducated and not able to run their business,that's why they are suffering a lot of financial problems.Through my business consultancy and newspaper i tried to give them real information about property transactions but that is not enough for them.So i planned to open institute named "Professional Development Institute"(PID) but due lack of funds i am in trouble.I have complete feasibility to open institute for free eduction in pakistan especially for those who are poor. I need $20,000/- to establish an institute. Kindly help me to to develop such institute ,so that i would be able decrease the poverty in Pakistan. My contact no:+92 300 4777901,Email:nadeem.mkt@gmail.com
lenders.occupational_info: I have two kids and sporting my family as self employed.I want to fulfill my dream to develop an institute named "Professional Development institute"in Lahore to overcome poverty in Pakistan.That's why i need loan of $20,000/- to manage and develop an institute.As i grow i will open branches all over Pakistan to develop the professional in the field of real estate and IT.  My name is muhammad nadeem ahmed.I have completed MBA/ MA and running my own newspaper on real estate sector from the last two years named "Monthly Property Boom".In Pakistan thousands of people are engaged in property business.Unfortunately most of them  are uneducated and not able to run their business,that's why they are suffering a lot of financial problems.Through my business consultancy and newspaper i tried to give them real information about property transactions but that is not enough for them.So i planned to open institute named "Professional Development Institute"(PID) but due lack of funds i am in trouble.I have complete feasibility to open institute for free eduction in Pakistan especially for those who are poor. lenders.occupational_info: We provide respite to those who need it by managing a group of cottages by the coast (in south-western Washington State's Long Beach Peninsula area), called Shakti Cove Cottages.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I believe people should help each other realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on how the government can better protect people from natural and manmade disasters.

lenders.name: Joe Cav
lenders.loan_because: We are honoring the Lord when we give to Him (Prov. 3:9).
lenders.occupational_info: World Championship Fighting (WCF) is a promotional company focused on live Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) events. WCF is the North East Area’s leading mixed martial arts sports association, formed in June, 2006 by Joseph Cavallaro and Associates, LLC.

lenders.name: niesha
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people live life the best that they can

lenders.name: Sudhindra
lenders.loan_because: I like to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on Computers for businesses

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to help - every little bit helps and I love the concept of micro-lending
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: To share the blessings that God has given me in this life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make sure that food is safe to eat.

lenders.name: Dan Kraus
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: putting the money to work to help an entrepreneur in another part of the world is a much better use of my resources than leaving it in a bank account.
lenders.occupational_info: Service development manager for a homeless charity in Stevenage:  www.haven.ik.com.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: Because I love utensils!

lenders.name: Will Spencer
lenders.loan_because: I am a huge fan of entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that giving other people opportunities makes everybody's horizon a little brighter.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a family caregiver for a number of years, and am now returning to community volunteer work.  My envolvement with Kiva helped prepare me for my month long visit to Kenya last summer.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I love this business model. Each of us can have an amazing impact and have fun at the same time. Great job Kiva!

lenders.name: Hima Bodagala
lenders.occupation: I am currently a medical student
lenders.loan_because:
If a small loan is what it takes for someone to start or keep a business and work towards a better life, then why not. 
     I was inspired by my brother who suggested micro-lending years ago and by Nicholas Kristof's article on the same subject in the NY times.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I'm a Humanist. http://www.iheu.org

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: The true measure of a society is not its wealth or technological advancement, but how it treats its less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am hopeful that my contribution to Kiva will make a difference in the lives of people in many different parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom taking care of my husband, kids, pets, and extended family.

lenders.name: Anonymous
lenders.loan_because: Even one person can make a difference.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I know the difference it makes when someone takes an interest in what your trying to achieve and lends a helping hand to make it happen.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have an interest in technology including Wireless Hotspot solutions - Wi-Fi!
My company ITWare supplies wireless hotspot in a box equipment to Cafes, Restaurants, Hotels, Resorts, Library's etc worldwide.

lenders.name: Da Rocha
lenders.loan_because: Eu me sinto bem por poder ajudar outras pessoas ao redor do mundo a melhorar seus pequenos negocios, da mesma forma como fui ajudado um dia. A cultura dos negocios é fundamental para melhorar o planeta.
lenders.occupational_info: Eu trabalho trazendo nutrição, saude e bem estar para pessoas, ajudando a melhorar o lado financeiro com a Herbalife. Eu trabalho todo dia para um mundo melhor, essa é minha missão. Eu estou atento a todas essas pessoas ao redor do mundo que desejam melhorar suas condições de vida.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this process and because helping people become self supporting is important to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children helping them with their problems.

lenders.name: Mica
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help provide clean water and new roads to cities.

lenders.name: Ami
lenders.loan_because: Assisting a woman in need so she can help herself and her children out of poverty is the least that I can do for my less fortuante sisters around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a computer at a university helping company's to hire engineering students for internships and jobs.  I also go to school and am studying for my BS degree.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves and share my success with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student as well as a teaching assistant.

lenders.name: The Professor
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others achieve their goals.  In the past many people have been generous with their time towards myself,  and I would like to share that.  Interested in higher education and learning pursuits.
lenders.occupational_info: University Professor

lenders.loan_because: I like to make money off the poor, eventually I will have 1000 loans and no longer have to work!! this is great I love kiva
lenders.occupational_info: please don't message complaints to hazyrazors is not me

Because I can ... (SP: porque puedo)

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a powerful agent of change, and I'm grateful to be able to play a small part in this organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for a nonprofit organization that works with global disability issues - I love my work!

lenders.name: Traugstenthorn
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled around south america and believe that most businesses are sound and growing. the investment will in turn produce more jobs hopefully and easier lives for those who are wisely using the funds raised .
lenders.occupational_info: i fix electronics, repairing oilfield equipment.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people an opportunity to better their own lives.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute and help out those who are looking to create a better life for themselves and thier families through entrepreneurship
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare homes for sale by creating universal warmth within the space which results in maximizing the homes' selling potential and reduces the amount of time the house is on the market

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Happiness only real when shared.

lenders.name: Mick/Gaynor
lenders.loan_because: We like to idea of helping another to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: - Retired police officer and  primary school teacher

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I have great respect for those who work hard to provide for themselves and their families.  I am fortunate enough to be able to share with others who want to make their lives better through work, ingenuity and perseverance.  I loan because it allows me to help others I would otherwise never know. "Big things have small beginnings."
lenders.occupational_info: I am a problem solver, both in the technical fields and in managing people and projects.

lenders.name: Douglas Family
lenders.loan_because: We admire people who are prepared to work to help themselves.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: Its awesome knowing you can help someone halfway around the world with a few clicks of the mouse.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.occupational_info: The people we work with do not get two full meals a day

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I believe that my Father has made me a steward of all He has given into my care. I want to bless those in need who want to do what they can for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Pastor of a congregation of ~30 people in metropolitan Perth (WA). The average age of the congregation is between 55 years.

lenders.name: Nana
lenders.loan_because: We would like to do this in memory of our Grandmother, Julia De La Garza.

lenders.loan_because: one day I would like to be able to provide affordable gas scooters and electric scooters to some of these distant countries.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell gas scooters, electric scooters and electric bikes online.  In addition we also sell a large number of scooter helmets imported from China.

lenders.loan_because: I can and it is needed. Period.

lenders.name: Joanne and Mike
lenders.loan_because: In the U.S. we have many opportunities to make a good life for ourselves and we want to do my part to help someone else realize their dreams too.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been in human resources for many years and enjoy helping people in obtaining their goals in life / I'm responsible for scheduling the production of three cheese manufacturing plants.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple and effective way to make a difference in someone life
lenders.occupational_info: raising money so we can take action to stop climate change, save forests and generally save the planet for the next generation

lenders.name: Austin

lenders.name: Anahita
lenders.loan_because:
I believe we are all connected. 

"All things are connected,
like the blood which unites one family.
All things are connected.
Whatever befalls the earth befalls the sons of the earth.

Man did not weave the web of life,
he is merely a strand in it.
Whatever he does to the web,
he does to himself."

-   Chief Seattle, 1854
lenders.occupational_info: I currently working as a scientist in a research lab. I am planning on going to graduate school next year to pursue a PhD in Neuroscience.
